title: Waterhelen
description: A refreshing cocktail perfect for summer gatherings, combining the sweetness of watermelon with the kick of tequila and lime.
instructions: In a shaker, combine the tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and watermelon juice.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake well until chilled.
Optionally, rim the glass with Tajín for a spicy kick.
Strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a slice of watermelon or a lime wedge if desired.
